G

Game - Class in logic
This class models a game itself.
Game() - Constructor for class logic.Game
Builds a default game as defined by initBoard and initPieces.
Game(GameBoard) - Constructor for class logic.Game
Builds a game using the passed in GameBoard.
GameBoard - Class in logic
This class models a game board.
GameBoard(Tile[][]) - Constructor for class logic.GameBoard
Creates a new game board based on a two dimensional array of tiles.
GameBoard() - Constructor for class logic.GameBoard
Creates a new game board filled with regular tiles.
GAMEBOARD_PADDING - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
The constant value for the GUI padding for the game board
GAMEPIECE_CAT - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the cat tile source
GAMEPIECE_DOG - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the dog tile source
GAMEPIECE_ELEPHANT - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the elephant tile source
GAMEPIECE_LEOPARD - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the leopard tile source
GAMEPIECE_LION - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the lion tile source
GAMEPIECE_RAT - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the rat tile source
GAMEPIECE_TIGER - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the tiger tile source
GAMEPIECE_WOLF - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
Constant value for the wolf tile source
GAMETILE_PADDING - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
The constant value for the padding for each game tile
GAMETILE_SELECTED_PADDING - Static variable in class logic.ConstantValues
The constant value for the padding for a selected game tile
GameView - Class in view
A graphical representation of the game.
GameView() - Constructor for class view.GameView
GameView constructor.
GameView(Game) - Constructor for class view.GameView
When loading a game this constructor should be called This will initialize the game view with a saved game
getBlackPieces() - Method in class logic.Game
Returns an ArrayList containing Red's pieces.
getColumn() - Method in class logic.Coordinate
Returns the column position stored internally in the coordinte.
getCurrentTurn() - Method in class logic.Game
Returns the current turn.
getGameBoard() - Method in class logic.Game
Allows the _gameBoard field to be examined.
getGameBoard() - Method in class logic.GameBoard
Returns the two dimensional tile array used to represent the board internally.
getGameMode() - Method in class logic.Game
Returns the game mode.
getLocation() - Method in class logic.piece.Piece
Returns the location of the current piece.
getLocation() - Method in class logic.tile.Tile
Returns the location of the current tile.
getName() - Method in class logic.piece.Piece
Returns the name of the current piece.
getName() - Method in class logic.tile.Tile
Get the name of the tile.
getNextMove(ArrayList<Piece>) - Method in class logic.Game
Returns the move the computer would make as black.
getNextMoveBlack() - Method in class logic.Game
Returns the move the computer would make as black.
getNextMoveRed() - Method in class logic.Game
Returns the move the computer would make as red.
getPlacedPiece() - Method in class logic.tile.Tile
Returns the piece placed on this tile.
getRank() - Method in class logic.piece.Piece
Returns the rank of the current piece.
getRedPieces() - Method in class logic.Game
Returns an ArrayList containing Red's pieces.
getRow() - Method in class logic.Coordinate
Returns the row position stored internally in the coordinte.
getSide() - Method in class logic.piece.Piece
Returns the side a piece belongs to.
getSpeed() - Method in class logic.piece.Piece
Returns the speed of the current piece.
getTile(int, int) - Method in class logic.Game
Returns the tile at the given row and column indexes.
getTile(int, int) - Method in class logic.GameBoard
Returns the tile at the given row and column indexes.
getUsualRank() - Method in class logic.piece.Piece
Returns the usual rank of the current piece.
getValidMoves(int, int) - Method in class logic.Game
Given a row and column containing a piece, all of the valid moves are returned in an ArrayList<Tile>.
getValidMoves(int, int) - Method in class logic.GameBoard
Given a row and column containing a piece, all of the valid moves are returned in an ArrayList<Tile>.
